participant_1.name: Evelyn Carter
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, I often find inspiration in the cosmos and enjoy crafting imaginative stories.
participant_1.background: I love the freedom to explore my creative side and write my own sci fi space adventures. I am not sure that my ethnic background is relevant to my current situation. My mother is a ballet dancer. I like to spend time alone, pursuing my own interests. Through them I have learned to make up myself and others.

participant_2.name: Marcus Lee
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and reflective, I find solace in music and literature, always seeking new experiences.
participant_2.background: I'd love to have lunch with my old coach, who taught me everything I know about football. I am a deaf man. I read fantasy novels to escape my reality. I play music to cheer myself up. I love to eat shrimp and lobster.

content.text: I love to read sci fi and write my own space adventures.
I love to read fantasy novels to escape reality.
I'm glad we have a common interest. What's your favorite fantasy novel?
I don't really have a favorite, I like to read different ones all the time.
I understand, I usually like to read books based on my current interests.
I've been reading a lot about space and aliens lately, so I'm looking for a good sci-fi novel.
Have you read the Foundation series by Isaac Asimov? It's a classic sci-fi series about a galactic empire that's falling apart.
I haven't, but it sounds right up my alley. I'll definitely check it out.
I hope you enjoy it. It's one of my favorite series of all time.
No problem. I'm always happy to talk books with people.
